name: Metamorphosis: Superior
description: Transform the caster (or, by ritual, another target) into any real, living creature. The transformed individual retains I.Q., memory, S.D.C. and hit points; physical appearance and non-mental attributes change.

name: Call Lightning
range: 300ft (91m); must be within caster's line of vision
description: Summon a lightning bolt from the sky to strike a specific target or point within range.

name: Summon Shadow Beast
duration: Special (remains until slain or mission completed; combat control typically 6 melees per caster level)
description: Summons a large inter-dimensional shadow creature to serve the caster. Shadow beasts are stealthy in darkness/shadows and extremely dangerous; there is a chance it will not return to its home dimension.
effects: May become uncontrolled (chance to remain in our world)

name: Compulsion
description: Implants a powerful, irresistible desire in the victim to pursue a simple, attainable action or object. The subject is consumed with the impulse for the spell's duration; a remove curse will negate the effect.

name: Cure Illness
saving_throw: None (standard if the person resists treatment)
description: Powerful healing invocation that cures ordinary diseases and illnesses (fever, flu, common infections). Does not cure cancer, internal organ damage, or magically induced sicknesses.
